name: Area CH-405
description:
Have you ever wanted to work at Area 51?

Well, this is the closest you're going to get, unless you do work at area 51 then please leave a comment about the realism of this game.

You're working as a UFO manager.

Your job is to contain the aliens.

You're reward, points, that are worth nothing.

Lastly, your goal is to keep your job as long as possible, supposedly Joe survived 2 minutes but there's no trace of him anymore.

Good Luck!
